scripts.gui-server-dev: pushd meetup-gui && npm run dev && popd
scripts.gui-server-prod: pushd meetup-gui && npm run prod && popd
scripts.authentication-server: pushd meetup-authentication && npm run auth-server && popd
scripts.app-server: pushd meetup-app && npm run app-server && popd
scripts.proxy-server: pushd meetup-proxy && npm run proxy-server && popd
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run gui-server-dev" "npm run app-server" "npm run authentication-server" "npm run proxy-server"
scripts.prod: npm run gui-server-prod && npm run app-server && npm run authentication-server
